mainBoard.flavorText: Never get between a goblin and the closest shiny object.

foreignData.flavorText: Komme niemals zwischen einen Goblin und einen glänzenden Gegenstand.
foreignData.name: Rhuk der Hexagold-Kraller
foreignData.text:
Verursacht Trampelschaden, Eile
Immer wenn eine ausgerüstete Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, außer Rhuk der Hexagold-Kraller angreift oder stirbt, kannst du alle Ausrüstungen, die an jene Kreatur angelegt sind, an Rhuk anlegen.

foreignData.flavorText: Nunca te metas entre un trasgo y el objeto brillante más cercano.
foreignData.name: Rhuk, ladronzuelo de hexoro
foreignData.text:
Arrolla, prisa.
Siempre que una criatura equipada que controlas que no sea Rhuk, ladronzuelo de hexoro ataque o muera, puedes anexar todos los Equipos anexados a esa criatura a Rhuk.

foreignData.flavorText: Ne vous interposez jamais entre un gobelin et l'objet brillant le plus proche.
foreignData.name: Rhuk, chipeur d'hexor
foreignData.text:
Piétinement, célérité
À chaque fois qu'une créature équipée que vous contrôlez autre que Rhuk, chipeur d'hexor attaque ou meurt, vous pouvez attacher tous les équipements attachés à cette créature à Rhuk.

foreignData.flavorText: Mai frapporsi tra un goblin e un ninnolo luccicante.
foreignData.name: Rhuk, Arraffatore di Esaoro
foreignData.text:
Travolgere, rapidità
Ogniqualvolta una creatura equipaggiata che controlli diversa da Rhuk, Arraffatore di Esaoro attacca o muore, puoi assegnare a Rhuk tutti gli Equipaggiamenti assegnati a quella creatura.

foreignData.flavorText: 最も手近にある光沢品とゴブリンの間に挟まれてはならない。

foreignData.text:
トランプル、速攻
あなたがコントロールしていて装備品がついていてこれでないクリーチャー１体が攻撃するか死亡するたび、あなたはそのクリーチャーについているすべての装備品を呪い金の警衛、ルクにつけてもよい。
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — ゴブリン・レベル

foreignData.flavorText: 千万别挡在鬼怪和离他最近的发光物中间。

mainBoard.name: Rhuk, Hexgold Nabber
mainBoard.originalText:
Trample, haste
Whenever an equipped creature you control other than Rhuk, Hexgold Nabber attacks or dies, you may attach all Equipment attached to that creature to Rhuk.

rulings.text: If that creature has more than one Equipment attached to it, you may move all of those Equipment to Rhuk or none of those Equipment to Rhuk. You can't move some of them and leave others.

mainBoard.text:
Trample, haste
Whenever an equipped creature you control other than Rhuk attacks or dies, you may attach all Equipment attached to that creature to Rhuk.

mainBoard.flavorText: Etch your victories in iron, that the world may celebrate them forever.

foreignData.flavorText: Ritze deine Siege in Eisen, sodass die Welt sie ewig feiern kann.
foreignData.name: Bestraferin der Schmelze
foreignData.text:
Bedrohlich
Zu Beginn des Versorgungssegments jedes Spielers fügt ihm die Bestraferin der Schmelze 2 Schadenspunkte zu, es sei denn, er kontrolliert zwei oder mehr Standardländer.

foreignData.flavorText: Graba tus victorias en el hierro para que el mundo pueda celebrarlas eternamente.
foreignData.name: Castigadora del Horno
foreignData.text:
Amenaza.
Al comienzo del mantenimiento de cada jugador, la Castigadora del Horno hace 2 puntos de daño a ese jugador a menos que controle dos o más tierras básicas.

foreignData.flavorText: Gravez vos victoires dans le fer, que le monde puisse les célébrer à jamais.
foreignData.name: Châtieuse du fourneau
foreignData.text:
Menace
Au début de l'entretien de chaque joueur, la Châtieuse du fourneau inflige 2 blessures à ce joueur à moins qu'il ne contrôle au moins deux terrains de base.

foreignData.flavorText: Incidi le tue vittorie nel ferro, cosicché il mondo possa celebrarle per l'eternità.
foreignData.name: Punitrice della Fornace
foreignData.text:
Minacciare
All'inizio del mantenimento di ogni giocatore, la Punitrice della Fornace infligge 2 danni a quel giocatore a meno che quel giocatore non controlli due o più terre base.

foreignData.flavorText: 鉄に勝利を刻め、さすれば世界がそれを永遠に祝福する。

威迫

foreignData.flavorText: Marque suas vitórias no ferro para que o mundo as celebre para sempre.

No início da manutenção de cada jogador, Castigadora da Fornalha causa 2 pontos de dano àquele jogador, a menos que ele controle dois ou mais terrenos básicos.

foreignData.flavorText: 将胜利蚀刻于钢铁之上，便可令全世颂扬不息。

foreignData.text:

mainBoard.name: Barbed Batterfist
mainBoard.originalText:
For Mirrodin (When this Equipment enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 red Rebel creature token, then attach this to it.)
Equipped creature gets +1/-1.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

rulings.text: If the Rebel is destroyed, the Equipment stays on the battlefield. Similarly, you may pay its equip cost to move it from the Rebel token to another creature you control.
If the ability causes two Rebel tokens to be created (due to an effect such as that of Mondrak, Glory Dominus), the Equipment becomes attached to only one of them.

The Rebel enters the battlefield as a 2/2 creature, then the Equipment becomes attached to it. Abilities that trigger when a creature enters the battlefield see that a 2/2 creature entered the battlefield.

mainBoard.name: Volt Charge
mainBoard.originalText: Volt Charge deals 3 damage to any target. Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

rulings.text: If the permanent or player is an illegal target when Volt Charge tries to resolve, it won't resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won't proliferate.
An ability that triggers "Whenever you proliferate" triggers even if you chose no permanents or players while doing so.

If a permanent ever has both +1/+1 counters and -1/-1 counters on it at the same time, they're removed in pairs as a state-based action so that the permanent has only one of those kinds of counters on it.

If a player or permanent has more than one kind of counter on it, and you choose for it to get additional counters, it must get one of each kind of counter it already has. You can't have it get just one kind of counter it already has and not the others.

Players can respond to a spell or ability whose effect includes proliferating. Once that spell or ability starts to resolve, however, and its controller chooses which permanents and players will get new counters, it's too late for anyone to respond.

To proliferate, you can choose any permanent that has a counter, including ones controlled by opponents. You can choose any player who has a counter, including opponents. You can't choose cards in any zone other than the battlefield, even if they have counters on them.

You don't have to choose every permanent or player that has a counter, only the ones you want to add another counter to. Since "any number" includes zero, you don't have to choose any permanents at all, and you don't have to choose any players at all.

mainBoard.text: Volt Charge deals 3 damage to any target. Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

rulings.text: If the Rebel is destroyed, the Equipment stays on the battlefield. Similarly, you may pay its equip cost to move it from the Rebel token to another creature you control.
If the ability causes two Rebel tokens to be created (due to an effect such as that of Mondrak, Glory Dominus), the Equipment becomes attached to only one of them.

The Rebel enters the battlefield as a 2/2 creature, then the Equipment becomes attached to it. Abilities that trigger when a creature enters the battlefield see that a 2/2 creature entered the battlefield.
